fields.name: Sharp GP2Y0A41SK0F infrared distance sensor in Smart Toilet Roll Holder
fields.description: The only sensor on the Smart Toilet Roll holder, in the backplate

fields.name: Beauty Box barcode scanner
fields.description: Adafruit barcode scanner, sensor 1 of 2 in beautybox thing

fields.name: Beauty Box weight sensor
fields.description: Scale with 5kg upper limit and sensitivity of ~2g, sensor 2 of 2 in beautybox thing

fields.name: Toilet roll infrared distance sensor
fields.description: The only sensor on the Smart Toilet Roll holder, in the backplate

fields.name: Toilet roll infrared distance sensor
fields.description: Gives an abstract value of the distance between the sensor in the backplate of the holder and whatever the light bounces off – toilet paper or cardboard tube.

fields.name: Beauty Box barcode scanner
fields.description: Adafruit barcode scanner, sensor 1 of 2 in beautybox thing

fields.name: Beauty Box weight sensor
fields.description: Scale with 5kg upper limit and sensitivity of ~2g, sensor 2 of 2 in beautybox thing

fields.name: Toilet roll remaining
fields.description: Due to variation in thickness and tube diameter across brands this is an abstract value of toilet roll remaining. Measurement decreases as distance between middle of roll and backplate on the holder increases.
